name: Sediments (part of Self-Archeology)
description: Video work accompanying sculptural works of Marina Oprea, exhibited at Lei Lei gallery, in Bucharest, July 2021. Excerpt from work:"The contemplation of these fragments of existence withdrawn from time suggests their implication in a ceaseless flow, in which the relation between past and present is one of coexistence rather than succession. Memory and time are as fluid as bodies and the landscape, as evident in the archeological sites in the deep recess of myself. The fossils extracted are at once familiar and alien, prompting multiplicity and the dissolution of identity." marinaoprea.com
